name: havenless
text: Ray has way too much money.

name: carlyle
text: Ray has way too much time on his hands.

name: soticoto
text: Damon has way too much Affleck on his hands.

name: anzio
text: I envy Ray for his ability to do any ol' thing that comes to his mind. I want that kind of financial backing for my crazy shenanigans.

name: darthemed
text: Teodor's eyebrows say so much.

name: chaesar
text: Matt Damon looks like a tired Leonardo DiCaprio.

name: suprememongoose
text: Ben Affleck on the other hand is quite horrified.

name: saint
text: i can actually picture the basketball scene...it's just that neither of them are smiling.

name: apocowarg
text: I am there and Matt Damon and Ben Affleck are there and it's just the three of us and I put the other players' bodies in my van and I am the winner

name: vermy
text: He finally WATCHED Gigli

name: greenkoolayd
text: he looks like lou reed.

name: anomalous3
text: A comment left by anomalous3 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by riotdejaneiro, heccibiggs, Jesler729, DiamondMonster, shrewbie, smashley, lamelliform, trisha, FablesandBlues, LordPretzel, godfatherofsouls, dinner, Zem, nutmeg, hellofditties, lazarusloafer, eRiUukFJk, nathanielperson, Panserbjorne, Dallovich, Darthemed)

name: tekende
text: I really don't see how this adds anything of value to this page whatsoever.

name: farqussus
text: despite the fourteen lames, this comes up green. i need to raise my chubby threshold.

name: heccibiggs
text: Mine is 6.

name: farqussus
text: My best comments tend to max out at three, so i guess that's where it'll stay, for the sake of my ego.

name: tekende
text: Mine is six also. We should be friends.

name: shutup_shutup
text: This basically implies that you make friends for dumb reasons.

name: tekende
text: I have plenty of time to debate what makes a friendship meaningful, if you're interested.

name: woodenteeth
text: Mine is 4. It seems to be a very reliable guide for interesting conversation, but not necessarily belly laughs.

name: teteae
text: Can one pose a wax figure after the fact?  I would think it to be difficult without compromising the integrity.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: He has totally captured the ghoulish expressions/qualities of wax reproductions, a la Mme Tussaud.

name: epicurus
text: for some reason I always see the pictures on the crates in panel 3 as male/female wasroom doors.

name: quazifuji
text:
I'm glad to know I wasn't the only one.

That would make going to the bathroom so confusing though. It's like when you try to go to a bathroom in a restaurant and they just have these weird icons on the bathroom doors and you have to think a bit to figure out which one's the right one. If I saw those on the bathroom doors, I wouldn't be sure what do to.

name: zem
text: out of ben affleck and matt damon, it's so obvious which one would stand for female that I don't even know what to tell you

name: quazifuji
text: I admit that this is true, and I hope that any restaurant owner who decided to put these on the bathroom doors agrees.

name: centipede_damascus
text: Matt Damon and Ben Affleck are just the best of friends. I wonder if they know about this strip...

name: twotonturkey
text: Is that Ben Affleck or Lou Reed from the album cover of "Transformer"?

name: darqhermit
text: It's both man. It's both .

name: charchar
text: It is Robert Smith

name: greenkoolayd
text: ah crap!  i shouldve read all the way before posting up there...... ben whofleck=lou reed=robert smith in that picture.  also, shoot me.

name: plusigot125
text: I think Ray would be Ben Affleck and Roast Beef would be Matt Damon. I bet that's what Ray had in mind when he ordered them too.

name: crinklebat
text:
3.8, guys? What?? This is one of my faves.

It was 3.7 when I got here and while I'm proud to have been able to give it a boost...I'm a little shocked, to be frank.

name: sirhan_duran
text:
I got it up to 3.9.

I'm significant now dudes

name: woodenteeth
text: I agree, this is a stupidly good strip. Taps the celebrity phenomena so incredibly well. Witty rather than laugh out loud funny, but SO good.

name: deusoma
text: I think this strip is really less about Matt Damon and Ben Affleck, and more about how weird Ray is.

name: i_love_kate
text: The head of the nail and the hammer have been introduced by Deusoma, and they are completely hitting it off.

name: josher
text: This is outright one of my all-time favourite strips. Can't believe it's not higher.

name: the_stoned_one
text:
i always picture it that he isnt throwing the ball to matt but giving it to him by hand
real friendly like
"here matt, you have a go"
"thanks ben!"

name: tragicone
text: A comment left by tragicone was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by smashley, drago25, hellofditties)

name: sp1derbaby
text: By the process of elimination, you must be Ben Affleck!

name: drago25
text: Matt & Ben jokes always win

name: postblank
text: Matt and Ben have yet to be informed that, like their chow mein, they are no longer big deals.

name: mangtastic
text: What a picturesque tableaux.

name: shoinan
text: Matt and Ben: Hollywood's Bert and Ernie.

name: hendetta
text: I had a dream a couple of weeks ago that I was about to get mugged by some punks, and Ben Affleck and Matt Damon jumped in and helped me.

name: tekende
text: I like the concept of this strip but those drawings look absolutely nothing like Matt Damon or Ben Affleck. I'm not even sure which is which.

name: echidnaboy
text: I think Affleck is the one on the left. The one which looks like Boris Karloff in Frankenstein . But I'm prepared to give Onstad the benefit of the doubt and say it's a comment on the general crappiness of Madame Tussaud's likenesses .

name: carlyle
text:
Ray looks really far down when he walks.

Or it is an illusion.

name: lolsworth
text:
They look more like Marc Almond and David Lynch.

Or both Mael brothers at once, and David Lynch.
